channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Business Automation Workflow

item.title: CVE-2023-32339|2023-06-27T16:57:53.458Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 255587.

item.title: CVE-2023-24957|2023-05-06T02:05:46.959Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 18.0.0.0, 18.0.0.1, 18.0.0.2, 19.0.0.1, 19.0.0.2, 19.0.0.3, 20.0.0.1, 20.0.0.2, 21.0.2, 21.0.3, 22.0.1, and 22.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 246115.

item.title: CVE-2023-50947|2024-02-04T00:11:02.465Z -- ibm -- business%20automation%20workflow
item.description: IBM Business Automation Workflow 22.0.2, 23.0.1, and 23.0.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 275665.
